faqs.question: What are the necessary legal documents required when purchasing a flat in Sector 87
faqs.answer: When buying a flat especially a new Flat For Sale in sector 87 you must ensure the project has RERA registration approval from the local development authority and a clear title deed. Post-purchase key documents include the executed Sale Deed Possession Letter Occupancy Certificate and the No Objection Certificate NOC from the society or builder. Always utilize a legal expert to verify all documentation before finalizing the transaction.
